quotes.quote: Most of the important things in the world have been accomplished by people who have kept on trying when there seemed to be no hope at all.
Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.
Successful men and women keep moving. They make mistakes, but they don't quit.
Courage doesn't always roar, sometimes it's the quiet voice at the end of the day whispering â€˜I will try again tomorrow'.
Don't give up. There are too many nay-sayers out there who will try to discourage you. Don't listen to them. The only one who can make you give up is yourself.
You can get everything in life you want if you will just help enough other people get what they want.
If you hear the dogs, keep going. If you see the torches in the woods, keep going. If there's shouting after you, keep going. Don't ever stop. Keep going. If you want a taste of freedom, keep going.

Keep going on hikes, keep having your friends in your life, keep that downtime sacred as well because as hard as you work in any job, it's really nice to have the relaxing de-stressors. Stress is the worst thing. That's the ultimate demise of any good thing.
I'll keep going until i get to the point where i can't get out on stage.
If you stop, you'll lose everything. You've got to keep going.
You keep going back and forth, saying what are we missing1 It's huge country, It's rugged country. That all plays on your mind.
Let everything happen to you. Beauty and terror. Just keep going. No feeling is final.
You simply have to put one foot in front of the other and keep going. Put blinders on and plow right ahead.
Our greatest weakness lies in giving up. The most certain way to succeed is always to try just one more time.
Keep going until your efforts start to make things better in your hometown.
Experience has taught me how important it is to just keep going, focusing on running fast and relaxed. Eventually it passes and the flow returns. It's part of racing.
That's what keeps me going: dreaming, inventing, then hoping and dreaming some more in order to keep dreaming.
Even if I don't finish, we need others to continue. It's got to keep going.
What other people think of me is none of my business. Sometimes, it hurts my feelings, but I have to just keep going.
Determination gives you the resolve to keep going in spite of the roadblocks that lay before you.
You just keep going and going. You go as fast as you want. I just like coming out here and doing it.
We're not going to quit. We're going to keep going after everybody.
It's been one of those years where you just try to keep going and learn on what you need to do to make yourself better. You just have to keep going.
We keep going because we are still finding some survivors. There was one yesterday, another one today. You can't just leave people behind.
Courage is not having the strength to go on; it is going on when you don't have the strength.
Believe in yourself and all that you are, know that there is something inside you that is greater than any obstacle.

I realized early on that success was tied to not giving up. Most people in this business gave up and went on to other things. If you simply didn't give up, you would outlast the people who came in on the bus with you.
Failure is a bend in the road, not the end of the road. Learn from failure and keep moving forward.
The success gate is far at the end of the long failure corridor. Keep moving no matter how many potholes you step into. You will get there with time!
We're all looking for a peaceful and safe place, but maybe there is no such place. But we keep going no matter what's waiting for us down the road. We don't stop living.
You may fall many times, but you must keep going.
It takes your knowing to decide on your going. If you know where you are going, you will keep going because you have already seen yourself gone.
If you keep going with a definite purpose, you will find the way and reach the destination.
Only one person can stop me or keep me going; I myself.
Never give up,keep going,don't quit,die in your tracks before ever giving up.If we back down every time we are faced with something tough,we are complete failures.
We get brave. we move. we believe. we keep going.
Inaction breeds doubt and fear. Action breeds confidence and courage. If you want to conquer fear, don't sit at home and think about it. Go out and get busy.
Once you realize there is a life after mistakes, you gain a self-confidence that never goes away.
I am not judged by the number of times I fail, but by the number of times I succeed: and the number of times I succeed is in direct proportion to the number of times I fail and keep trying.
Success is a little like wrestling a gorilla. You don't quit when you're tired. You quit when the gorilla is tired.
Training has been such a huge part of my life and career I hope to keep going with it.
Believe in yourself, take on your challenges, dig deep within yourself to conquer fears. Never let anyone bring you down. You got to keep going.
It is the combination of reasonable talent and the ability to keep going in the face of defeat that leads to success.
Art is longing. You never arrive, but you keep going in the hope that you will.
You learn to rise above a lot of bad things that happen in your life. And you have to keep going.
If someone is strong enough to bring you down, show them you are strong enough to get back up.
Keep on going, and the chances are that you will stumble on something, perhaps when you are least expecting it. I never heard of anyone ever stumbling on something sitting down.
